Booking FAQ

Common questions about booking your consultation

Is the consultation really free?

Yes, absolutely! Your initial consultation is completely free with no obligation to proceed with any treatment.

How long is the consultation?

Consultations typically last 30-45 minutes, giving us plenty of time to discuss your goals and answer all your questions.

Can I book same-day appointments?

We try to accommodate same-day requests when possible. Call us directly for the best chance of same-day availability.

What should I bring to my consultation?

Just bring yourself and any questions you have. We'll provide all the information you need about treatments and pricing.

Have more questions about booking?
